modName: PeCool's armors replacement UNP-UNPB - Desetrer X models
summary: This is a simple replacement of some of the original vanilla armors with the Deserter X models.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#8e7cc3][size=4][i][font=Comic Sans MS]DESCRIPTION[/font][/i][/size][/color][size=2]
[font=Tahoma][size=3]
I'm an enthusiast of the work done by Deserter X with his Ursine, Gwelda, Sotteta, Tembtra and Merta packs.

Some time ago I was published two replacers: Imperial, Stormcloaks and Dawnguard soldiers but since them have got some incompatibilities with the slots used I've decided to make a new version that not use any esp file and only replaces the original vanilla meshes with a modified version of the Deserter X ones.

The process of creating the new meshes is tedious and time consumer and, since I not have much time to spare, I will publish my work when I got it ready so, I recommend that if you're interested in my future replacers, will track this mod because the version number will not going to change.

Those replacements will need the original mods installed (this gives you the opportunity to endorse them), but if you, like me, are always worried by the high number of esp files in your game, you can disable the original esp files because this mod only needs her amazing textures.


[color=#8e7cc3][i][font=Comic Sans MS][size=4]PUBLISHED AND PLANNED ARMORS[/size][/font][/i][/color]

[/size][list][size=3][*][size=3]Stormcloak soldiers - [color=#00ff00]Published[/color] - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55924/?]Ursine armor pack[/url][/size][/*]
[*][size=3]Imperial soldiers - [size=2][font=Tahoma][size=3][size=3][color=#00ff00]Published[/color] [/size][/size][/font][/size]- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55924/?]Ursine armor pack[/url][/size][/*]

[color=#8e7cc3][i][font=Comic Sans MS][size=4]CREDITS[/size][/font][/i][/color]
